description: A humorous explanation for birds flying south in winter.
title: Winter Flight
n_1: Eddie the eagle questions why birds fly south each winter.
n_2: Birdie the sparrow mentions the long distance to the south.
n_3: They discuss the challenges of winter migration.
n_4: Finally, they agree on the reason with a humorous twist.
c1_4: So, it’s too far to walk!
